summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of CRM helpline application. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly. Tested user registration/login, dashboard statistics, contact management, call logging with auto-contact creation, call history with filters, CSV export, timer functionality, and protected routes.
passed_tests: Contact CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Call logging with auto-contact creation for new phone numbers
Call timer functionality with real-time display
Navigation between all pages (dashboard, contacts, calls, call log)
User logout functionality via dropdown menu
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
Frontend-backend integration for all CRUD operations
